passages.text:
You are a 23 year old man who works a dead end job just trying to make ends meet.
One random Tuesday morning, you wake up feeling woozy and shrug off the events of the night before. "Huh, I can't remember what I did last night" You get ready for the day, and drive to work.
[[Drive to work->Drive to work]]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
You arrive at work and realize that you have a couple options:
[[Go into work->Work]]
[[Skip work->Skip work]]
passages.name: Drive to work

passages.text:
You decide to take the day off.
[[Take the train downtown]]
[[Get drunk with the boys->Daydrinking]]
passages.name: Skip work

passages.text:
You get off the train & decide to walk to the city market
[[Walk to the City Market->CityMarket]]
passages.name: Take the train downtown

passages.text:
You meet a beautiful woman at the city market and have a wonderful day together. You end up falling in love and live the rest of your live happily. One night in your 50s, you go to sleep and...
[[Go to sleep->Start]]
passages.name: CityMarket

passages.text:
You get to work and go see your boss. He fires you. You ponder for a second:
[[Kill him->KillBoss]]
[[Leave->LeaveWork]]
passages.name: Work

passages.text:
Someone sees you stab your boss through the heart and calls the cops. You have no options left but to run.
[[RUN]]
passages.name: KillBoss

passages.text:
You leave work and realize you have more choices to make:
[[Go hang out with the boys->Daydrinking]]
[[Take the train downtown]]

links.name: Go hang out with the boys

passages.name: LeaveWork

passages.text:
You go over to your friend's house and get drunk. Nothing much really happens that day. You go home around 1am and pass out on the couch.
[[Wake up the next morning->Start]]
passages.name: Daydrinking

passages.text:
Your efforts are in vain. The police catch you, and in your fit of murderous rage, you attempt to stab an officer, and get shot and die in the process.
[[You Die, and everything goes back for a second, before...->Start]]

links.name: You Die, and everything goes back for a second, before...

passages.name: RUN
